title: Executive Order 8178-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of August 2, 1875, Withdrawing Public Land
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me as President of the United States, the Executive order of August 2, 1875, reserving lands for lifesaving purposes, is hereby revoked as to the following-described land:
T. 32 S., R. 40 E., sec. 20, E½ of lot 1, containing ten acres.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8178-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of August 2, 1875, Withdrawing Public Land Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368681
